title: Solid state Tesla coil
detail: Play audio on a Tesla coil
extended_details: Control a Tesla coil to play music and audio files. Preprocess the audio file into a series of tones that can be played on the Tesla coil. The device will feature solid state control using an H bridge to control the current through the primary coil instead of the traditional spark gap.
